Warning: Flickering light may trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Do not show this again Acknowledge I\'ve found this awesome Flashlight app, check it out here: \n Feedback App version To save the battery, the light turns off automatically after minutes. You can change this in settings.
Thanks, I’ve got it! Speed Slow Fast Repeat Frequency Flashlight is on Tap to turn off flashlight Strobe light is on Tap to turn off strobe light SOS light is on Tap to turn off SOS light Share via Send via Can\'t create directory to save image. Image could not be saved.
